EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Driving Real Insights Through Data Science_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Driving Real Insights Through Data Science Event on 10/27
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thank you for registering for the upcoming Driving Real Insights Through Data Science event <http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science> in Bridgewater, NJ on October 27. Please find the event details below:
Date: Tuesday, October 27, 2015 Time: 12:00PM to 4:15PM Location: Bridgewater Marriott <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/sosbw-bridgewater-marriott/>, 700 Commons Way, Bridgewater, NJ 08807 <https://www.google.com/maps/place/700+Commons+Way,+Bridgewater,+NJ+08807/@40.5849849,-74.6132622,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89c39541c5339c59:0x807de6c28ec271f9>
{{my.Save the Date - New Jersey:default=edit me}}
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <"mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
